
/*programmed by dipjal */

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<math.h>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;




static inline ll scan2()
{
    ll x=0;
    char c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c<'0'||c>'9')
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
    {
        x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return(x);
}

static inline int scan1()
{
    int x=0;
    char c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c<'0'||c>'9')
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
    {
        x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return(x);
}


static inline void WriteInt(int x)
{
    char s[7];
    int l=0;
    do
    {
        s[l++]=(x%10+'0');
        x/=10;
    }while(x);
    l--;
    while(l>=0)
    {
        putchar_unlocked(s[l]);
        l--;
    }
    putchar_unlocked('\n');
}

//ll a[100001];
int main()
{
    int T;
    int n;
    int M;
    int i;
    ll *a;
    ll O;
    ll chef;
    scanf("%d",&T);
    while(T--)
    {
    n=scan1();M=scan1();O=scan2();
    a=(ll *)malloc(n*sizeof(ll));
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        scanf("%lld",a+i);
    chef=a[0];
    bool ok=chef>=O;
    sort(a,a+n);
    i=n-1;
    int cnt=0;
    while(i>=0&&a[i]>=O&&cnt<M)
    {
        cnt++;
        i--;
        if(cnt==M||a[i]<O)
            break;
    }
    if(!ok)
    {
        putchar_unlocked('-');
        putchar_unlocked('1');
        putchar_unlocked('\n');

    }
    else
    {
        WriteInt(cnt);
    }
    free(a);
    }


    return 0;

}
